column1: accepting_flemish_people_title;Embracing the Flemish;;;;;;;;;;x
accepting_flemish_people_desc;The Flemish of the late Duchy of Brabant are very similar to our own people linguistically and culturally. Really
column2: we are the same people separated for too long by political borders. Let us rectify this by embracing the Flemish as our brothers!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: union_brabant_title;The Union of Brabant-Wallonia;;;;;;;;;;x
union_brabant_desc;The Duchy of Brabant has been absorbed into our lands
column2: now we shall mend the cultural rift created between our people due to artificial political borders. Let us embrace our northern brothers and include them in our institutions and government. Glory to Wallonia and Brabant!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_benelux_title;Form Leo Belgicus;;;;;;;;;;x
form_benelux_desc;Leo Belgicus has been a term used since the 16th century to describe the Low Countries
column2: maps often depicted the region in the form of a lion. Today
column3: the Low Countries are united as one and we shall adopt this title as our nation's name to represent this accomplishment. Prosp�rit� et unit�! Welvaart en eenheid!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: aid_BYZ_ALB_title;Propose Military Aid to the Empire;;;;;;;;;x
aid_BYZ_ALB_desc;The Empire is facing a difficult time right now
column2: and we have managed to secure autonomy. If we play our cards right
column3: we can attain independence! By offering military aid in exchange for the promise of full sovereignty after the rebellions are over
column4: we can offer a peaceful
column5: respectable solution to Autokrator Georgius' problems.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: aid_BYZ_BUL_title;Propose Military Aid to the Empire;;;;;;;;;x
aid_BYZ_BUL_desc;The Empire is facing a difficult time right now
column2: and we have managed to secure autonomy. If we play our cards right
column3: we can attain independence! By offering military aid in exchange for the promise of full sovereignty after the rebellions are over
column4: we can offer a peaceful
column5: respectable solution to Autokrator Georgius' problems.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ANA_claim_victory_title;Claim Victory;;;;;;;;;;x
ANA_claim_victory_desc;By capturing Constantinople
column2: the seat of the Empire and Georgius
column3: we can end this war and claim the throne. Let Georgius flee if he likes. He who controls the city controls the Empire.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annexation_of_saxony_title;The Annexation of Saxony;x
annexation_of_saxony_desc;Saxony failed to take part in the Brunswick Congress
column2: but they must not be allowed to remain outside the German question. They will join us peacefully
column3: as much for their protection against our neighbors as for the protection of all Germans. If they do not
column4: war is no doubt near for them.;x

column1: approach_aqt_title;Approach Aquitania;;;;;;;;;x
approach_aqt_desc;Both Naples and the Padan Union have expressed a territorial interest in our islands. As they know we would refuse to join them
column2: this interest is expressed as a military threat to our sovereignty. Aquit�nia is a new-born republic like our own. We should build our relations with them
column3: in order to secure our republic.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: barbarian_islands_title;Settle the Barbarian Islands;;;;;;;;;x
barbarian_islands_desc;For generations
column2: we have exercised limited control over Hokkaido
column3: to our north
column4: and had even less contact with the savage natives of Takasago Koku
column5: to our south. We should extend the beneficence of civilization to their misty shores.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_albina_title;Become Albina;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_albina_desc;Now that we control all of the island of Bryten
column2: we represent the old kingdom of Aengland hundreds of years ago. In honour of this
column3: and our friendship with all peoples of Bryten
column4: we will create a new empire

column1: begin_greek_rebellion_title;Begin the Rebellion of Greece;;;;;;;;x
begin_greek_rebellion_desc;With crowds in Athens singing songs of the Hispanian Revolution translated into Greek Roman
column2: Athanasius Dioskoros
column3: Proedros of the Council of Revolutionaries
column4: proclaimed the foundation of the Democracy of Greece to a crowd in front of the Strategeion of the Agora of Athens in 1859. Calling for all Greeks to rise up and defend the country from the incoming Roman reprisal
column5: he laid the groundwork of Greek liberal nationalism with his 40-minute speech.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bohemian_zadar_title;The Zadar Proposal;;;;;;;;;;;x
bohemian_zadar_desc;Bohemia is one of the most powerful and industrialised countries in the world
column2: yet we are landlocked and dependent on our neighbours to conduct international trade. We should change this. Having a warm relationship as we do
column3: perhaps we could propose that Croatia lease us that port in Zadar
column4: and we will
column5: in return
column6: fund railroads which both we and they can use
column7: as well as giving them a sum of money. Our ministers expect that approximately 25
column8: 000 will be sufficient to sway them.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: boukoleon_restoration_title;Restore the Boukoleon Palace;;;;;;;;;;;x
boukoleon_restoration_desc;The Boukoleon Palace was the residence of the Emperors of the Roman Empire from the 11th century until the 16th century
column2: when it was damaged by Armenian occupations during the many wars when the Empire was on its back foot at the height of Muslim power. Since then
column3: it has stood in ruins
column4: as the Emperors have had other concerns. Restore and rebuild the palace to beautify and glorify our city!;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BRB_sell_new_brabant_islands_title;Sell the New Brabant Islands;;;;;;;;;x
BRB_sell_new_brabant_islands_desc;Since the loss of Zeeland
column2: we no longer have the means to maintain our far-flung colonies of New Brabant in the west Pacific. As long as we're abandoning them
column3: we should try to make some profit off of them. Let's look for someone to buy them.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: BRT_is_France_title;Brittany is part of France!;;;;;;;;;;;x
BRT_is_France_desc;Brittany was a part of France not much more than a century ago. They have enjoyed their independence for long enough. Having shown them our might when we reclaimed our colony
column2: they can't possibly refuse to rejoin us!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: build_oheskewen_canal_title;Build the Oheskewen Canal;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
build_oheskewen_canal_desc;If there were a canal to bypass Niagra Falls
column2: finally
column3: boat traffic could pass between the Native Lakes and the rest of the world! Imagine the profits!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: buy_aqt_s_ameriga_title;Offer to buy Aquit�nia's South Amerigan Colonies;;;;;;;;;x
buy_aqt_s_ameriga_desc;Aquit�nia has recently informed us that they are searching for a buyer for their colonies of Porterei and Nova Bordeu.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
buy_dutch_natal_title;Buy Dutch Natal;;;;;;;;;;;x
buy_dutch_natal_desc;After the conclusion of the Emden Accords
column2: the cession of Oostkaap to $COUNTRY$ isolated the former territory of the Steenkooler republic of Natal. The Dutch had difficulty administering this territory as resident Zulus began to make trouble. By offering to buy the land and incorporate it into our colonies in South Africa
column3: we can take this problem off of their hands.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: call_brunswick_congress_title;Call the Brunswick Congress of Germans;;;;;;;;x
call_brunswick_congress_desc;Given the recent Bavarian violation of Mainzer sovereignty
column2: it is clear that the king in M�nich does not intend to abide by the terms of the Peace of Augsburg. Therefore
column3: it is time to summon the old allies to a congress to propose a more permanent response to the Bavarian threat - to join forces under one banner and one ruler for the good of all!;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: call_brunswick_congress2_title;Call the Brunswick Congress of Germans;;;;;;;;x

call_brunswick_congress2_desc;Agitation among the inhabitants of the various states of the old Holy Roman Empire has been increasing recently. Calls for German unification and a rising sense of kinship that transcends political borders has caused some unrest among the people because of the rivalries of the princes. We should call delegates from around the north to discuss the situation. External threats are another concern that will weigh heavily on delegates' minds and we will likely see many states banding together politically.;;;;;;;;;;x
cancel_zadar_lease_title;Cancel the Zadar Lease;;;;;;;;;;;;x
cancel_zadar_lease_desc;With the fall from grace of Bohemia
column2: they are no longer able to make use of their port. Indeed
column3: they don't even have the means to access it at the time. Let us unilaterally end the lease and retake Zadar.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cancel_zadar_lease_HUN_title;Cancel the Zadar Lease;;;;;;;;;;;;x
cancel_zadar_lease_HUN_desc;Our relations with Hungary have soured in recent years
column2: and they have acted increasingly insulting towards us despite our generosity in leasing them Zadar. Let us punish their foolishness by canceling their lease unilaterally and retaking Zadar for ourselves
column3: no matter the consequences.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cede_emden_title;Cede Emden;;;;;;;;;;x
cede_emden_desc;With the failure of the diplomatic option in the proposed Emden Accords with our German neighbour
column2: we are faced with a difficult decision. Tensions over the city will only continue to mount
column3: and we must ask ourselves if we want to risk war to hold such a small region. If we cede the city to German and relinquish our claims
column4: a costly war could be avoided.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cisalpines_are_italian_title;The Padanians are Italian!;;;;;;;;;x
cisalpines_are_italian_desc;The Cisalpine people of Padania speak a language quite similar to ours
column2: and have long shared in the cultural and economic life of the Italian peninsula. Given our power
column3: especially compared to theirs
column4: surely none will dare oppose us for claiming what is rightfully ours. Gloria per la patria!;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_aegean_title;Claim the Aegean Islands;;;;;;;;;x
claim_aegean_desc;The Empire is in no position to maintain control over these islands
column2: which have much more in common with our ideas of trade and prosperity than the dusty old notions of empire and blind loyalty to the royalty in Constantinople. We will lay claim to these islands and take them for ourselves
column3: for the good of their inhabitants and ours;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_balearics_title;Claim the Balearic Islands;;;;;;;x
claim_balearics_desc;The Balearic Islands of Mallorca and Menorca have long held an important position in the trading of the western end of the Mediterranean
column2: and acquiring them would bolster our reputation and ability to control and conduct trade in that region. By claiming the islands
column3: we risk war with some powerful neighbours
column4: but it must be done for the good of all citizens of the Republic!;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_bar_lorraine_title;Claim Bar and Lorraine;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_bar_lorraine_desc;The French crown's ownership of Bar and Lorraine can be traced back to the time of Charlemagne. The two duchies were part of the Holy Roman Empire
column2: but
column3: being on its periphery
column4: never were an integral part
column5: and remained neutral in the Imperial War. They are populated by French-speaking peoples
column6: and our spies tell us there is some support for joining us. Other countries may laugh at our claim
column7: but we will take Bar and Lorraine for ourselves! Fortitudo per unitatem!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_brittany_title;Claim Breizh;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_brittany_desc;We have long been sundered from our brothers on the European continent
column2: proud descendants of the last holdouts from the Romans
column3: and last holdouts of our once-numerous and great people on the continent. Now that we have reclaimed power in the north
column4: let us extend our protection to our Breizhoneg brothers in Brittany and ensure that they will never have to face the world alone!;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_carapara_title;Claim the Carapara Islands;;;;;;;;;;x

claim_carapara_desc;The Carapara Islands lie off the west coast of South Ameriga and are a veritable Eden. Let us claim them for ourselves so that we may explore their beauty for the betterment of $COUNTRY$!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_corsar_title;Claim Corsica and Sardinia;;;;;;;;;x
claim_corsar_desc;Corsica and Sardinia have long held an important position near the rich cities of Aquit�nia
column2: Provence
column3: and the north of the Italian Peninsula. Acquiring these islands would bolster our reputation and ability to control and conduct trade in that region. By claiming the islands
column4: we risk war with some powerful neighbours
column5: but it must be done for the good of all citizens of the Republic!;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_elsass_lothringen_title;Claim Elsass;;;;;;;;;;x

claim_elsass_lothringen_desc;There are Germans to be found in territory nominally controlled by the French. We should remedy this situation and annex this region as a buffer zone between the revanchist French and our industrial heartland.;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_empire_BAV_title;Claim the title of "Emperor of All Germany";;;;;;;;;x
claim_empire_BAV_desc;Our ascendant position among our German brethren and the increasing consolidation of our kingdom means we have the means
column2: the will
column3: and the right to finally prove to the world that we are the rightful rulers of Germany. By proclaiming ourselves Emperor
column4: we will be able to directly challenge the other German powers for overlordship of the great German people.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_empire_BRA_title;Claim the title of "Emperor of All Germany";;;;;;;;;x
claim_empire_BRA_desc;Our ascendant position among our German brethren and the increasing consolidation of our kingdom means we have the means
column2: the will
column3: and the right to finally prove to the world that we are the rightful rulers of Germany. By proclaiming ourselves Emperor
column4: we will be able to directly challenge the other German powers for overlordship of the great German people.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_empire_BRN_title;Claim the title of "Emperor of All Germany";;;;;;;;;x
claim_empire_BRN_desc;Our ascendant position among our German brethren and the increasing consolidation of our kingdom means we have the means
column2: the will
column3: and the right to finally prove to the world that we are the rightful rulers of Germany. By proclaiming ourselves Emperor
column4: we will be able to directly challenge the other German powers for overlordship of the great German people.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_far_east_title;Claim the Far East;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_far_east_desc;We have reached the eastern coast of Asia. Let us mount an expedition to claim it for the glory of $COUNTRY$!;;;;;;;;;x
claim_galicia_title;Claim Galicia;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_galicia_desc;With our newfound power
column2: we have the credibility and the strength to bring our northern cousins under our benevolent rule. Maybe we'll have to fight Hispania for them
column3: but it'll be worth it!;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_heptanesa_title;Claim Heptanese Islands;;;;;;;;;x

claim_heptanesa_desc;The Heptanese islands of Zakynthus and Kerkyra have long held an important position at the mouth of the Adriatic. Acquiring these islands would bolster our reputation and ability to control and conduct trade in that region. By claiming the islands
column2: we risk war with some powerful neighbours
column3: but it must be done for the good of all citizens of the Republic!;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_malta_title;Claim Malta;;;;;;;;x
claim_malta_desc;Malta has refused our offer to join our republic. We must incorporate them
column2: even if they are currently unwilling to see the right in our cause.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_remote_siberia_title;Claim Remote Siberia;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_remote_siberia_desc;We should mount an expedition to explore and formally claim the northern interior of Siberia for $COUNTRY$!;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_roman_throne_title;Claim the Roman Throne;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_roman_throne_desc;Evangelos Melisurgos
column2: uncle to 15-year old Georgius
column3: the current Autokrator of the Roman Empire through his father
column4: Ioannes
column5: feels that he is better suited to lead the Roman Empire in this time of rebellions and crises. By enacting this decision
column6: you will preempt the game event which will fire approximately 9 months after Anatole has a military score of 10. You have until then to prepare for war to take the throne.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_rose_title;Claim Ros�;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_rose_desc;Daufinat has chosen to join the Padan Union
column2: but this is primarily because of the Cisalpine inhabitants of the Piemont. The inhabitants of the Ros� River valley and regions nearby - even in the Alps - are much closer to ours in terms of culture and language
column3: and it would be better if they were united with their kin!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_sicily_title;Claim Sicily;;;;;;;;;x
claim_sicily_desc;Sicily has long held an important position separating the eastern and western parts of the Mediterranean
column2: and has changed hands many times throughout the centuries. Acquiring this populous island would bolster our reputation and ability to control and conduct trade in the central Mediterranean. By claiming Sicily
column3: we risk war with some powerful neighbours
column4: but it must be done for the good of all citizens of the Republic!;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_suazi_title;Claim the Lands of the Suazi;;;;;;;;;x
claim_suazi_desc;Our impi are strong and our kingdom feared by all. Let us take what will not be willingly given to us
column2: starting with the tiny kingdom of the Suazi!;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_venice_PDN_title;Assert Our Claim to Venice;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_venice_PDN_desc;A foreign conqueror stole Venice from the Cisalpine people while our federation was taking its first breaths
column2: a time when we were unable to contest the conqueror. Now that we are strong and established
column3: the Doge-of-Venice-in-Exile is petitioning us to assert his (and thereby our) claim to Venice
column4: and restore order to the region.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_wales_cornwall_title;Claim Cymru and Kerno;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_wales_cornwall_desc;As we grow in strength
column2: we may challenge Aengland for control over our Celtic brothers in Cymru and Kerno. We will
column3: of course
column4: have to fight a long and hard war if we want to actually hold these territories
column5: but we can face that when the time comes.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_zeeland_title;Claim Zeeland;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_zeeland_desc;Being a great and powerful nation
column2: others will surely not deny that we are the rightful owners of Zeeland. Indeed
column3: some of the towns and cities of the region expressed interest in joining our kingdom when we united in 1814. However
column4: they already belonged to the Duchy of Brabant
column5: and the Duke there was not friendly to the cause we represented. Now
column6: however
column7: we can take Zeeland by force

column1: colonise_drytsiben_title;Colonise Drytsiben;;;;;;;;;x
colonise_drytsiben_desc;We should expand out to the edge of our claims on the plains so that no one else can take them from us. These lands may be fertile farmlands
column2: or perhaps some useful resources might be found in them. Besides
column3: more land for our growing population is always good.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: colonise_jukuna_title;Colonise Jukuna;;;;;;;;x
colonise_jukuna_desc;The lands that the natives call Jukuna are
column2: quite frankly
column3: inhospitable. But with the gold and other riches we found in Iggatlan
column4: there may be more further north! Besides
column5: some opportunistic states
column6: like Dabimon or Hispania
column7: may in time try to lay claim to the north
column8: and thus try to envelop us in some way. Let us instead settle some key outposts and ensure that these lands are made ours!;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: colonise_necen_title;Colonise Necen;x
colonise_necen_desc;The interior of Ameriga just east of the great mountains is good farming land
column2: and sparsely inhabited by natives. Let us claim it for $COUNTRY$!;x

column1: colonise_newea_title;Colonise Newea;x
colonise_newea_desc;The vast plains of the center of Ameriga stretch far north
column2: and the region we have come to call Newea is the northern limit of good farmlands. If we take it
column3: we can secure our frontier and acquire fertile land for the good of $COUNTRY$.;x

column1: colonise_oai_title;Colonise Oailand;;;;;;;;;;x
colonise_oai_desc;There yet remain unclaimed areas of the inner plains of Ameriga
column2: inhabited by a few savages clinging to their ways. If these lands are anything like the neighbouring provinces we own
column3: they could be fertile farm- and grazelands. Let us claim the territory for our own
column4: before someone else takes it!;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: colonise_rouge_ues_title;Colonise Rouge-Ues;;;;;;;;;x
colonise_rouge_ues_desc;It is time to expand into the interior of the northern plains. These are vast
column2: treeless expanses
column3: but explorers have long claimed that they would be fertile farmland and grazeland. It will cost some money to fund settlements in key locations to establish our claims
column4: but rest assured
column5: it'll be worth it.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: colonise_ters_dauror_title;Colonise the Interior of the Ters d'Auror;;;;;;;;;x
colonise_ters_dauror_desc;These lands in the far north of the continent are not good for much
column2: being filled with stunted forests and permafrost
column3: but if we don't claim them
column4: someone else might
column5: like Skamisc or another greedy country. Who knows
column6: maybe one day some use may come of these lands.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: declaration_of_mantua_ai_title;Promulgate the Declaration of Mantua;;;;;;;;;;;;x
declaration_of_mantua_ai_desc;In 1849
column2: the Council of the Union
column3: at the behest of its constituent rulers and in light of the growing strength and cohesion of the Union's armed forces
column4: made a joint proclamation to the world. Considered to be the seeds of a national identity
column5: the Declaration decreed that all states which the Neapolitan kingdom had absorbed must be released by Neapolitan King Giuseppe I Salenino. It further stated the ambition of the Padan Union to annex the Romagna region into its territory
column6: given its proximity to the namesake Po River. By issuing this declaration
column7: war between Naples and the Union was a foregone conclusion.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: declaration_of_mantua_title;Promulgate the Declaration of Mantua;;;;;;;;;;;;x
declaration_of_mantua_desc;In 1849
column2: the Council of the Union
column3: at the behest of its constituent rulers and in light of the growing strength and cohesion of the Union's armed forces
column4: made a joint proclamation to the world. Considered to be the seeds of a national identity
column5: the Declaration decreed that all states which the Neapolitan kingdom had absorbed must be released by Neapolitan King Giuseppe I Salenino. It further stated the ambition of the Padan Union to annex the Romagna region into its territory
column6: given its proximity to the namesake Po River. By issuing this declaration
column7: war between Naples and the Union was a foregone conclusion.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: declare_greek_independence_title;Declare Independence;;;;;;;;;x
declare_greek_independence_desc;We have survived the war and retained all of our territories! Our fledgling democracy has shown the power of the common man! Let us take steps to ensure our safety
column2: because the Empire will no doubt come knocking again!;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: declare_romanian_unity_title;Declare the Unity of the Volasean Peoples;;;;;;;;;;x
declare_romanian_unity_desc;With the instability and troubles in the Empire
column2: the growing nationalist unrest in the Volasean provinces could finally be funelled into a successful movement. Under the guidance of Hospodar Gradisteanu
column3: the boyars and obste are mobilising to help Romania forge its own path. This will mean war with the Empire and our brothers in Wallachia
column4: who lick the heels of the Romans.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: demand_corsica_owned_title;Demand Corsica & Sardinia;;;;;;;;;;x

demand_corsica_owned_desc;We have claims in the Maretan islands. Let us make good on them and demand what's rightfully ours from Aquit�nia. $RNote for the player: This may lead to war almost immediately$W.;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_corsica_puppet_title;Demand Corsica & Sardinia;;;;;;;;;;x

demand_corsica_puppet_desc;We have claims in the Maretan islands. Let us make good on them and demand what's rightfully ours from Aquit�nia. $RNote for the player: This may lead to war almost immediately$W.;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_independence_BYZ_title;Demand Independence from the Empire;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_independence_BYZ_desc;Now that the war is over and Georgius has defeated his uncle
column2: the Empire is restabilized. At the beginning of the war
column3: we offered our military support in exchange for independence after peace had been restored. Let us now remind Georgius and his counselors of his promise so that we may stand on our own.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: dissolve_old_duchy_CMP_title;Dissolve the old Duchy of Champagne;;;;;;;;;x
dissolve_old_duchy_CMP_desc;Now that we have claimed the throne of France
column2: the Duchy of Champagne should pass from a legitimate title of power to one merely of respect. Our house will forever be known as Kings of France and Dukes of Champagne
column3: but no longer will the Duchy exist
column4: within our borders or without.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: dissolve_old_duchy_ORL_title;Dissolve the old Duchy of Orl�ans;;;;;;;;;x
dissolve_old_duchy_ORL_desc;Now that we have claimed the throne of France
column2: the Duchy of Orl�ans should pass from a legitimate title of power to one merely of respect. Our house will forever be known as Kings of France and Dukes of Orl�ans
column3: but no longer will the Duchy exist
column4: within our borders or without.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: dissolve_old_duchy_NRM_title;Dissolve the old Duchy of Normandy;;;;;;;;;x
dissolve_old_duchy_NRM_desc;Now that we have claimed the throne of France
column2: the Duchy of Normandy should pass from a legitimate title of power to one merely of respect. Our house will forever be known as Kings of France and Dukes of Normandy
column3: but no longer will the Duchy exist
column4: within our borders or without.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_catalans_title;Embrace Catalans;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_catalans_desc;The Catalans have always been a proud people
column2: often discontented with living under the Hispanian Empire. Nevertheless
column3: with time and effort it will be possible to bring them back into the fold.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_catalans_IRK_title;Embrace Catalans;;;;;;;;;x

embrace_catalans_IRK_desc;The Catalans of the Balearic Islands Mallorca and Menorca have long been an important part of trading in the western part of the Mediterranean. We should make them feel welcome in our republic and give them equal rights.;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_galicians_title;Embrace Galicians;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_galicians_desc;The Galician people have a unique cultural identity
column2: though one it is not entirely different from that of the Spanish. We should work to make them feel welcome within our Empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_irish_title;Embrace the �irisc;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_irish_desc;With control over �irland now established
column2: we should look toward integrating them into our own culture
column3: allowing them some say in our government and welcome among our own people.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_maltese_title;Embrace the Maltese;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_maltese_desc;The Maltese people are few and confined to their islands
column2: but they are a proud race with a long history. They should be made to feel welcome and to be equal in our society if we are to truly be a republic.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_maretans_title;Embrace the Maretans;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_maretans_desc;The Marenan people are few and confined to their islands
column2: but they are a proud race with a long history of self-reliance and self-sufficience. They have put that aside now to seek prosperity in partnership with us. Thus
column3: they should be made to feel welcome and equal in our society
column4: for the good of all.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_nanfaren_title;Accept Nanfanren;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_nanfaren_desc;The Southerners speak languages that sound different than ours
column2: and they prefer rice over noodles
column3: but we are all Chinese.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_portuguese_title;Embrace Portuguese;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_portuguese_desc;The Portuguese speak a language that is noticeably distinct from Spanish and will resent our rule at first. However
column2: by allowing some regional autonomy and making a sincere effort to respect their culture
column3: we might forge a new era of cooperation between the Spanish and Portuguese people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_romansh_title;Protect Romansh People;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_romansh_desc;The Romansh people are a small minority we inherited after annexing Helvetia. Too few to have their own country
column2: members of local Romansh communities have petitioned our government for official protection
column3: as was the case under the Helvetian government. They cite their strong ethnic and cultural ties to Germany - despite their strange language -
column4: as well as their past services to Helvetia
column5: which they would gladly pass to us as their new rulers should we allow them the same rights as proper Germans. Offering protection to such a petty minority might demean a country as great as ours
column6: but would be looked up favorably in the eyes of foreign moralists
column7: as well as helping to restore a sense of normalcy to the former Helvetian cantons.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_sicilians_title;Embrace the Sicilians;;;;;;;;;x

embrace_sicilians_desc;The Sicilian people are hardworking and numerous. They have elected now to seek prosperity in partnership with us. They should have ever right and privilege extended to them as to our Greek-speaking citizens
column2: for the good of all.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_little_russians_title;Embrace the Little Russians;x
embrace_little_russians_desc;They may speak strange versions of the language of the Great Russians
column2: but they can still be useful to the empire. Let us accept these people with open arms.;x

column1: embrace_slovaks_title;Embrace the Slovaks;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_slovaks_desc;The Slovaks have long lived peacefully under our rule. Almost identical in language and culture
column2: their separate identity stems more from geography than anything else. By calling them equals and allowing them use of their language in Slovakia proper
column3: we will earn their adoration and simultaneously make governance easier.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: emden_accords_title;Propose a Solution to Emden;;;;;;;;;;x
emden_accords_desc;With the further unifications of the Germans of the north
column2: they now have real cause and real strength to reclaim Emden
column3: which we refused to give to Brunswick. In advance of tensions that will inevitably arise from the situation of our ownership
column4: we should propose some solution. Let us approach the Germans and negotiate.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: encourage_tatar_revolts_title;Sow Dissent Among the Smolenskii Tatars;;;;;;;;;;;;x
encourage_tatar_revolts_desc;Spread rumours and support dissident Tatars
column2: and we may manage to destabilize our enemy's realm and make it easier to destroy them.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_smolensk_title;Put an End to Smolensk;;;;;;;;;;x
end_smolensk_desc;Now that all the lands of Smolensk are lost to them
column2: it is time to "convince" the Korol of Smolensk and his family to abandon all claims to the former kingdom and thus allow the Tsar to have uncontested control of their lands.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_the_nobility_title;End the Nobility;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_the_nobility_desc;Now that the rebellious dukes of Champagne
column2: Orl�ans
column3: and Normandy have been put down
column4: we should remove their power and any chance that they could threaten France again! They shall be nobility in their memories only!;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: enlist_tatars_title;The Kazan Pact - Kazanskii Dogovor;;;;;;;;;;;;x
enlist_tatars_desc;The more populous crown of Smolensk
column2: which falsely claims to be heir to Russia
column3: has many more soldiers than do we. There is
column4: however
column5: opportunity. The Tatars
column6: the once-feared horselords of the steppe
column7: are divided subjects of both countries. If we curry favour with them
column8: we may be able to destabilize Smolensk
column9: allowing us to defeat them. By accepting the Kazani Tatars as equals
column10: we may gain an important advantage with all of the inhabitants of the steppe. However
column11: stories of their cruelty remain and the other peoples of our empire may not be so happy.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: expand_BHN_title;Claim Hungary's Historical Borders;;;;;;;;;x

expand_BHN_desc;The crown of Hungary once encompassed a much wider area than it does today. We can expand our territory and further earn the loyalty of the Hungarians by helping them reclaim their historical greatness.;;;;;;;;;;x
expand_halesca_title;Expand Halesca;;;;;;;;;;x
expand_halesca_desc;Given Skamisc and other countries' ambitions in North Ameriga

column4: and we can exploit the resources to be found in our rich
column5: if far-flung

column1: expand_to_kilikia_title;Expand to Kilikia;;;;;;;;;;x
expand_to_kilikia_desc;With the war over and peace restored
column2: we can once again look outward. The Muslims in Armenia are weak and hold territory that was once Roman. Let us reclaim it and cut them off from the Mediterranean
column3: thus weakening them further.;;;;;;;;x

column1: expedition_to_okhotsk_title;Mount the Svetaev Expedition;;;;;;;;;;x
expedition_to_okhotsk_desc;In 1845
column2: Count Bogdan Svetayev was commissioned by the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government to explore and lay claim to lands at the western coast of Asia beyond the recently conquered lands of the Yakuts. Svetayev and his men mapped out the coast of the Sea of Okhotsk from the border of Manchurian-claimed land to the Bay of Ayan
column3: claiming it in the name of $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: fight_for_latvia_title;Fight for Latvia;;;;;;;;;;x
fight_for_latvia_desc;It is clear that military intervention is necessary in Latvia if we are to guarantee that their movement for independence succeeds. To war!;;;;;;;;;;x
form_greater_netherlands_title;Form the Greater Netherlands;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and thus form a greater Empire than has been seen in our region for almost a millennium!;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_mellomamerika_title;Form Mellomamerika;;;;;;;;;;x
form_mellomamerika_desc;Our superiority over our other Mellomsk neighbors puts us in a position to form a powerful union of Mellomamerika. Let us embrace our destiny!;;;;;;;;;x
form_irakleio_title;Declare the Republic of Irakleio;;;;;;;;x
form_irakleio_desc;The fortunes of our island trade republic continue to rise
column2: and it is necessary that we no longer be confined to an old name and an old way of thinking. We must restructure our country to better ensure our continued survival and prosperity. Let us rebrand ourselves as the Republic of Irakleio
column3: a truly cosmopolitan country where prosperity
column4: not ethnicity or language
column5: is the deciding factor in a man's worth.;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_stellaland_title;Form Stellaland;;;;;;;;;;x
form_stellaland_desc;With the lands of the Steenkoolers united under our banner
column2: we can seek a greater destiny for everyone under the four stars of our people. Let us never bow to Europeans or Africans.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_zachadia_title;Form Zachadia;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_zachadia_desc;Some philologists have confirmed what we have already long known: that the Poles
column2: Czechs
column3: Silesians
column4: Slovaks
column5: and Sorbs all speak closely related languages. These languages they have come to call the Western Slavic family. Given our cultural
column6: linguistic
column8: we could unite our peoples into a truly great nation.'\n\n\ $Y NB: Western Slavs must control Silesian and Polish cores (Slovakia can be owned by them
column10: and Prague/Bohemia must be sphered and puppeted with +100 relations.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: further_the_revolution_in_DAU_title;Further the Revolution in Daufinat;;;;;;;;x
further_the_revolution_in_DAU_desc;The monarchists of our cousins in Daufinat are facing serious opposition from their own liberal people

column3: we may be able to convince the Duke
column4: Guigues de Mauguio
column5: to give up rather than lose his life fighting for a lost cause.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: garda_civica_title;Form the Garda Civica;;;;;;;;;;x
garda_civica_desc;In revolutionary Aquit�nia
column2: giving the people more say in the maintenance of order was a top priority in securing and legitimising the new
column3: post-royal government. Thus
column4: as a means of restoring order and prosperity to the country
column5: the Garda Civica was formed. Composed of volunteer citizens of both sexes
column6: the GC was meant to bring peace.;;;;;;;;;;x

greek_macedonia_arbenon_desc;Now that we have proven our strength to the failing Empire and to the world

column3: to the ancient Greek lands before the Empire established its rule over us all those long centuries ago. The myriad peoples in these lands have much in common historically and culturally with ours
column4: even if their languages may now be different. Let us incorporate them into our revolutionary democracy!;;;;;;;;x

column1: greek_sevastopol_title;Restoration of Cherson;;;;;;;;;x
greek_sevastopole_desc;Now that we have reclaimed the ancient theme of Cherson
column2: it is time to restore its old names and invite the Roman diaspora around the sea to settle in the land of their ancestors.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gxi_destiny_title;Unite Greater China;;;;;;;;;x
gxi_destiny_desc;By restraining foreign influence in our kingdom
column2: we can demonstrate our cultural purity and position Nanyue to unite the disparate lands of China.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gxi_seasia_destiny_title;Unite Southeast Asia;;;;;;;;;x
gxi_seasia_destiny_desc;Now that we have separated from China
column2: we should follow our roots and unite the many peoples of Southeast Asia under our banner.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hegemony_gidan_title;Establish Hegemony over Gidan;;;;;;;;;;x
hegemony_gidan_desc;The people of Gidan speak our language and share many aspects of our culture. While historically
column2: we were separated by the vast wildernesses of the northern bank of the Jordrac River
column3: the advance of progress allows us to bring them under our wing for the good of all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: helvetian_patrimony_title;The Helvetian Patrimony;;;;;;;;;x
helvetian_patrimony_desc;The Germans of the South are united under one flag. Almost united. The cantons of Helvetia
column2: long isolated by choice from Germany proper
column3: must be brought into the fold. It will not be by their decision that the destiny of Germany left to rot by the side of the road to glory. They must join us
column4: for the good of all Germans.;;;;;;;;;;x

hispania_by_sword_desc;Hispania was always one of the dominant powers in western Europe
column2: but in 1829
column3: the League of the Ten Monarchs violently and unjustly stripped away many of our core lands to limit our power even as they restored us to our rightful place on the throne. By declaring a Reconquista of all Iberia

column1: honour_vikings_title;Honour the Vikings;;;;;;;;;;x
honour_vikings_desc;The people of $COUNTRY$ were fierce warriors
column2: feared throughout Europe
column3: not much more than 600 years ago
column4: and they had a lasting impact on the world. Let us honour their enterprising spirit!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

host_munich_conference_desc;With the unification of the northern states into just two major powers

column3: it is time that we
column4: too
column5: unify with our brethren
column6: Baden and Wurttemburg. We will call this conference and coerce their heads of state into joining us

column1: HtA_POL_setup_title;Poland Setup;x
HtA_POL_setup_desc;Poland is ruled not only by the king
column2: but also by the Sejm - a legislative chamber composed of nobles of the realm who vote by majority rule. This body has met semi-annually for six weeks since time immemorial. A democratic body
column3: it stands in stark opposition to the more absolutist methods of rule Poland's neighbours employ. The involvement of nobility tends to guarantee their investment in the well-being of the state
column4: and this has effects beyond the legislation the body produces: each member ensures that the land he owns is as prosperous as can be.;x

column1: incite_byelorussians_title;Incite Byelorussians;;;;;;;;;;;x
incite_byelorussians_desc;If we are to continue to weaken our rival in Smolensk
column2: then it will not be on the field of battle
column3: but in the hearts and minds of the downtrodden minorities of their empire. We will stir up local grievances in order to sow chaos in their country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: incite_ukrainians_title;Incite Ukrainians;x
incite_ukrainians_desc;The Ukrainians have long had a separate identity from the Great Russians
column2: even those of Smolensk. Their culture and language are similar
column3: but their history of fraternization with the Cossacks has institutionalized distrust against them by the ruling elites of the country. We can inflame old tensions to strengthen the Ukrainians and to cause further headaches for Smolensk.;x

column1: incorporate_brabant_title;Incorporate Brabant into the Netherlands;;;;;;;;;x
incorporate_brabant_desc;Now that we've claimed Zeeland
column2: why not just get the rest of the Duchy of Brabant
column3: too? After all
column4: its inhabitants are all Dutch speakers
column5: even if they have a strange dialect. Incorporating the Flemish of Brabant is a natural step in continuing to ensure our greatness.;;;;;;;;;;x

info_RUS_desc;War with Smolensk will come later

Go as far east as possible with colonization. Only after you've taken the decision to incite Ukrainians will the CB become available for both countries (or if it's after 1850).;x

column1: info_SML_title;HtA Smolensk Info;x
info_SML_desc;You start in a very strong position to overwhelm Russia (indeed
column2: it should be easy!)
column3: but you'll have to be patient. You'll be able to fabricate the special casus belli later after certain conditions are met - namely the Russians have to have taken a decision to incite your Ukrainian POPs (or if it's after 1850). The reason for not being able attack right away is that the populace of Smolensk
column4: being highly faithful
column5: would never (initially) support a war against Russia. To be honest
column6: I don't expect a lot of people to play Smolensk because it's likely to be a boring first two or three decades.;x

column1: inland_claims_title;Our Inland Claims;;;;;;;;;;;x

inland_claims_desc;Uilscyr has been making plans to go up and claim the far reaches of the tributaries of the Jordrac River. This would bring them uncomfortably close to our territory. We should beat them to the punch
column2: and maybe we'll discover some useful and interesting things in these lands.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_cymru_title;Integrate Cymru;;;;;;;;x
integrate_cymru_desc;It was only in 1829 that the Duke of Cymru
column2: Owain of Aberdaugleddau
column3: made his realm subservient to ours
column4: in a moment of diplomatic clarity. However
column5: recent events between our two countries and a changing diplomatic situation abroad necessitate that we establish direct control over the Cymraeg lands. Perhaps the Duke can be made to see reason
column6: but if not
column7: then use of force must be considered.;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_navarra_title;Integrate Navarra;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

integrate_navarra_desc;Personal unions and vassal states are an antiquated concept more befitting of the 17th century than the 19th. Let us work to make Navarra a truly intrinsic part of the Hispanian Empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column4: that they may take it to make a brigther future for all.;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_navarra_title;Union with Navarra;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_navarra_desc;The Basque people have a long history of cooperation with our nation and Navarra

invite_romagna_PDN_desc;Now that Romagna is free from the clutches of the Neapolitans

column1: keep_the_peace_in_syrmia_title;Keep the Peace in Syrmia;;;;;;;;;;x

Tensions are running quite high among peasants and the Hungarian nobility as the famine worsens. It seems that governmental authorities have decided to ignore the situation entirely and the region is becoming increasingly violent
column2: with crime and vagabondage spilling over into our borders. It is time to step in and restore order.;;;;;;;;;;x

liberate_tuscany_title;Liberate Tuscany;x
liberate_tuscany_desc;With Romagna safe in our hands and our strength consolidated

maretans_are_italian_desc;The Maretans of Corsica and Sardinia speak a language quite similar to ours

med_islands_join_forces_cyprus_desc;Crete is a rising star

column3: we can contribute to their fledgling republic and forge for ourselves a bright future!;;;;;;;;x

column1: med_islands_trade_republic_title;Declare a trade republic;;;;;;;;x
med_islands_trade_republic_desc;Now that we are free
column2: we must forge our own path. Our guiding rule will not be blind faith in a distant emperor

column2: for good or for ill

column6: Germany

megalux_dutch_desc;With our star rising so quickly

move_capital_to_paris_desc;Now that the duke of Champagne has been subdued

column4: is finally back in our hands! Let us reinstate it as our capital!;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_prague_title;Move the capital back to Prague;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_prague_desc;Now that we control Prague again
column2: let us reinstate it as our capital.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

move_capital_to_zagreb_desc;Now that Zagreb has been returned to its rightful owners

restore_order_in_hungary_title;Restore Order in Hungary;;;;;;;;;;x

retreat_to_hayastan_title;Retreat to Hayastan;x

return_croatian_land_title;Seek the Return of Croatian Land;;;;;;;;;;;x

return_croatia_to_croatia_title;Return Croatia its Land;;;;;;;;;;;x

return_to_the_sea_title;Return to the sea!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x,,,,
return_to_the_sea_desc;Now that we have reclaimed the French heartland that was cruelly taken from us years ago we should once again lay claim to the Normand coast. Then we can truly reclaim our place in the world as a great power!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
revive_armenian_anatolia_title;Revive Armenian Anatolia;;;;;;;;x

revolt_against_smolensk_title;Revolt Against Smolensk;;;;;;;;;x
revolt_against_smolensk_desc;The Russians have promised us freedom and protection from Smolensk if we aid them in the war. Indeed, they have been spreading unreast among all the Tatars and steppe peoples, even outside our land. With the Russians, we will have greater freedom. To war!;;;;;;;;;x
roman_adriatic_title;Roman Adriatic;;;;;;;;;;x
roman_adriatic_desc;Now that we have reclaimed Italy, we should once more look to the Adriatic Sea. Claiming the land around the coast will be costly diplomatically, but none will prevent the Roman Eagle from spreading its wings again!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
roman_italians_title;Embrace the Italians;;;;;;;;;;x

scaglia_decree_desc;From the newly appointed summer residence at Scaglia near Civitavecchia, King Giuseppe II Salenino decreed that all denizens of Tuscany and Romagna were to become Italian citizens effective immediately, with all the rights pertaining. This was devastating to the nascent rebel movements in the regions. Their hitherto popular support was all but eliminated in an instant as the weary people of the north began to give up fighting for a lost cause and accepted their place as equals.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
